div.p: I don’t think I ever left school and thought gosh I want to be a letting agent, it just kind of happened from doing self-employment jobs
and it not working out and then from a personal perspective buying a house, renting it out, then it started intriguing me and I got to a point in my life
where I needed to have a full-time career and this is what I got into because I knew a lot about it at that point.
I love the variety, I love the people, you know I think it’s all about connecting with humans whatever we do and whatever job we’re in so it’s nice to build a
relationship, as a letting agent you don’t just, you know, rent a house to somebody and you never see them again it’s about, you know,
